column4: then there must be a boot loader at the beginning of the disk (mbr) that chainloads into sda7.
yes, I have installed GAG, a boot manager, windows xp and 7 are already installed and booting
do you mean that the boot starts with mbr on sdb (hd1)? and that it shall chainload into sda7 (hd0,6or7)?
All I know is that it loads the GRUB that is installed at /dev/sda7
